mapper.insert: insert into trade(id, name, b_bankname, b_username, b_account, amount, type) values(#{id}, #{name}, #{b_bankname}, #{b_username}, #{b_account}, #{amount}, #{type})
mapper.select: select * from trade where type=#{type} order by t_num desc
select * from trade where id=#{id} order by t_num desc
mapper.update: update trade set result=true where t_num=#{t_num}
